task.en: Preview STHeiti (Simplified Chinese) in Font book.
task.zh: 在字体册中预览华文黑体（简体中文）。
task.ar: استعرض الخط STHeiti (الصينية المبسطة) في كتاب الخطوط.
task.ja: Font BookでSTHeiti（簡体中文）をプレビューしてください。
task.ru: Просмотрите шрифт STHeiti (упрощённый китайский) в Книге шрифтов.

grading_command: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "STHeiti" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "华文黑体" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Simplified Chinese" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "简体中文" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "الصينية المبسطة" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "簡体字中国語" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Упрощенный китайский" && echo "True" || echo "False"
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get name of first process whose frontmost is true' || grep -q "Font Book" && echo "True" || echo "False"
